summary: The diff implements comprehensive backend optimizations for video finalization including error handling, performance logging, storage validation, and chunk assembly logic. All five requirements (REQ-87 through REQ-91) are addressed with detailed implementations in backend/main.mo. A migration module was added to handle data structure changes. Frontend hooks were modified to support the enhanced backend functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) implementing data structure transformation for videoChunks from Map<VideoId, List<ChunkId>> to Map<VideoId, List<VideoChunk>>
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention any need for data migration, schema changes, or handling of pre-existing deployment states. The constraints specify maintaining single-actor architecture but do not request migration functionality.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend modifications including post-upload delay (POST_UPLOAD_DELAY = 2500ms), exponential backoff retry logic with specific timing (1s, 2s, 4s, 8s, 16s), and enhanced polling mechanisms in useQueries.ts
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'Altering the frontend upload or retry logic' and in constraints: 'Maintain existing timeout mechanism (30 seconds) in frontend'. The diff shows modifications to retry logic and delays that were explicitly excluded.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes to MasterPresentationPlayer.tsx with automatic polling, exponential backoff, and connection reset error handling
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest scope is limited to backend optimizations in backend/main.mo. Frontend component changes beyond what's necessary to consume the backend API were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modifications to MasterVideoUploader.tsx including external persistence error prop support and enhanced finalization state indicators
hallucinated_features.reason: The constraints state 'Preserve existing chunked upload implementation in MasterVideoUploader component', suggesting minimal changes. The BuildRequest focuses on backend fixes, not frontend upload interface enhancements.
